channel.title: Running Steam Through an External Hard Drive
channel.description:
Recently, in an effort to save space on my laptop's hard drive, I decided to reinstall Steam, and all of my Steam games onto an external hard drive. Steam works fine, but I'm unable to get certain games to run (like all except for HL1).
Does anyone know if it is possible to fix this problem, or should I just try reinstalling Steam normally.
